mapper.select: SELECT id FROM `hm_order_child` WHERE start_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND order_state='reservation' AND room_id=#{roomId} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT child.id,child.end_time,pay_cash_num+other_pay_num as cash ,room_rate+other_rate+free_rate_num as total , oder.check_type FROM `hm_order_child` child INNER JOIN hm_order oder ON oder.id=child.order_id
WHERE order_state='admissions' OR order_state='notpay' AND room_id=#{roomId}

SELECT type.id,type.room_type_name roomType ,COUNT(room.id) count FROM hm_room_type type LEFT JOIN hm_room room ON type.id=room.room_type_id AND type.hotel_id=#{hotelId} AND room.show='yes' GROUP BY type.id
